name: KrillPure® (Krill Oil)
description: KrillPure® (Krill Oil) is extracted from antarcitic krill, its major components are omega-3 fatty acids, phospholipids and Astaxanthin. In Krill oil, the omega-3 fatty acids are bounded to phospholipids, which provides better absorption by the body than fish oil. Another component Astaxanthin is the most powerful antioxidant on the planet, which can help fight Inflammation. MTC KrilPure® delivers krill oil at the highest purity and potency with the lowest heavy metal content.
